author: Ted Byrne
content:
It would be rude to ask Houdini to explain his tricks, or to ask tinsel town babe how she manages to look so hot... (the first would bark "no comment" and the latter would insist that she never even wears makeup)... so I won't ask about the post processing.

But I will comment on the wonderful palette that reinforces the composition and which breaks the plane into two stories. Interesting how color paints distinct emotions. Which I think is why I find monochrome so much less interesting.

Nice work...
